sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-navbar toggleable="lg" type="dark" variant="primary" class="shadow-sm">
    <b-container fluid>
      <b-navbar-brand :to="'/dashboard'">
        <b-icon icon="briefcase" class="mr-2"></b-icon>
        Project Manager
      </b-navbar-brand>

      <b-navbar-toggle target="nav-collapse"></b-navbar-toggle>

      <b-collapse id="nav-collapse" is-nav>
        <b-navbar-nav>
          <b-nav-item :to="'/dashboard'" exact-active-class="active">
            <b-icon icon="house-door"></b-icon> Dashboard
          </b-nav-item>
          <b-nav-item :to="'/projects'" exact-active-class="active">
            <b-icon icon="folder"></b-icon> Projects
          </b-nav-item>
        </b-navbar-nav>

        <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto">
          <b-nav-item-dropdown right>
            <template #button-content>
              <b-icon icon="person-circle"></b-icon>
              {{ userName }}
            </template>
            <b-dropdown-item disabled>
              <small class="text-muted">{{ userEmail }}</small>
            </b-dropdown-item>
            <b-dropdown-divider></b-dropdown-divider>
            <b-dropdown-item @click="handleLogout">
              <b-icon icon="box-arrow-right"></b-icon> Logout
            </b-dropdown-item>
          </b-nav-item-dropdown>
        </b-navbar-nav>
      </b-collapse>
    </b-container>
  </b-navbar>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex'
import eventBus from '../../bus/eventBus'

export default {
  name: 'NavBar',
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('auth', ['getUser']),
    userName() {
      return this.getUser?.name || 'User'
    },
    userEmail() {
      return this.getUser?.email || ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleLogout() {
      this.$store.dispatch('auth/logout')
      eventBus.$emit('show-notification', {
        message: 'Logged out successfully',
        variant: 'info'
      })
      this.$router.push('/login')
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.navbar {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
</style>
